name: A Date With Your Serial Killer [Demo]
name_original: A Date With Your Serial Killer [Demo]
description:
This game will be updated in the future!

IF YOU HAVE TRACEBACK ERRORS, RESET THE GAME FROM THE TOP LEFT CORNER!

Word count - 1700 approx

Play time | 5 mins 

SUMMARY:

Why not try online dating? Meet new people, get to know them and get a date! but would you still want to if you only matched with a blank profile? You go through with it and surprisingly meet an unsettlingly cute guy, maybe somethings off about him?

The game updates in small chapters!

(Not recommend for children, Possible eyestrain and disturbing imagery.)
